channel.title: I need a TUT badly
channel.description:
i need a short sweet but thorough guide. you can email me at zerohero490@yahoo.com or you can post here
i desperatley want to use my server.
also heres wat i have for my compile
@echo off title GooberScape client "c:\program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp .*.java "c:\program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
and heres wat i have for my runserver
@echo off Color 0a title GooberScape java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
and when i open compile then runserver at the very bottom of compile it says Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server press any key to continue....
it says the same thing on runserver when i open that tho.
what am i doing wrong? also thats the only thing it says under runserver when i open it but it says a lot more on compile.
Also please tell me if thats what is supposed to be typed when i edited compile and runserver.
ty.

item.title: I need a TUT badly
item.dc:creator: @zerohero490 zerohero490
item.description:
@zerohero490 wrote:

i need a short sweet but thorough guide. you can email me at zerohero490@yahoo.com or you can post here

i desperatley want to use my server.

also heres wat i have for my compile

@echo off
title GooberScape client
“c:\program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp .*.java
“c:\program files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

and heres wat i have for my runserver

@echo off
Color 0a
title GooberScape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

and when i open compile then runserver at the very bottom of compile it says
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
press any key to continue…

it says the same thing on runserver when i open that tho.

what am i doing wrong? also thats the only thing it says under runserver when i open it but it says a lot more on compile.

Also please tell me if thats what is supposed to be typed when i edited compile and runserver.

ty.

Read full topic
